Summary: Sighted aerial object,looked for wings,no wings,object disappeared
divs: Sighting DetailsOn January 24,2007,I was walking my dog just a few yards to the South of South of Skyline Road NE in Albuquerque ,NM at approximately 9:05 am. to 9:25 am.At approximately 9:13 am,I happened to look up to my 11:00 position above my head I saw ,what I thought was an aeroplane,except I couldn't see any wings, traveling in a Northeast to Southwest direction at approximately 15,000 feet.The weather was very clear with no clouds in sight.As I watched to see if I could see the wings,the object disappeared.Once again,NO CLOUDS or anything else to obstruct my view.There was no discernable sound coming from the object,but I can't swear to that because a Southwest Airlines jet was taking off from Albq. Int. Airport and was swinging around to head on a Northwest heading taking it pretty much right over my head.I did not see any lights associated with the object and it looked like a fuselage of dull grey with no wings.It did not reflect the sunlight,which was very bright at the time.The other thing I remember was that it appeared to be starting to bank to the South and that is why I was looking for shadows of wings or a tail when it "disappeared" from full view,still at the approximately 11:00 position.
trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There were no other sightings in Albuquerque on or around January 24th 2007
